name: Roger JOHNSON v. COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION

parties:
Roger JOHNSON
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION
attorneys: The petitioner Roger Johnson's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 166 Conn. App. 903, 137 A.3d 968 (2016), is denied.
casebody.head_matter:
Roger JOHNSON
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION
Supreme Court of Connecticut.
Decided September 13, 2016
Justine F. Miller, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.
Emily D. Trudeau, deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.
The petitioner Roger Johnson's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 166 Conn. App. 903, 137 A.3d 968 (2016), is denied.
